column1: Smoque BBQ////Finallyyyy made my way here last weekend after waiting WAY too long to make a visit. Holy crap
column2: this place is good. I went with my boyfriend who had been several times
column3: so he knew exactly what to order (thank god because it all looked good). We went with one platter of sliced brisket and one platter with a half slab of St. Louis ribs. For sides
column4: we got the mac and cheese
column9: and a cup of BBQ gumbo on the side. Everything was so
column12: good! The sauces on top of it all were delish. I left very full and very satisfied. Can't wait to go back!
